ticket.title: Rails::Rack::Debugger is killing _all_ rails generators
ticket.original-body:
Reproduce:
@@@ Gemfile: gem 'ruby-debug'
development.rb: ... config.middleware.use Rails::Rack::Debugger ... @@@
Try running any generators(rails g controller zippo) and it will only show the usage, but not generate anything.
I'm pretty confident it's caused by http://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/railties/lib/rails/rack/debugger.rb#L9

ticket.original-body-html:
Reproduce:

  Gemfile:
    gem 'ruby-debug'

  development.rb:
    ...
    config.middleware.use Rails::Rack::Debugger
    ...

Try running any generators(rails g controller zippo) and it will only show the usage, but not generate anything.

I'm pretty confident it's caused by http://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/railties/lib/rails/rack/d...

Try running any generators(rails g controller zippo) and it will only show the usage, but not generate anything.
I'm pretty confident it's caused by http://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/railties/lib/rails/rack/debugger.rb#L9

Reproduce:

  Gemfile:
    gem 'ruby-debug'

  development.rb:
    ...
    config.middleware.use Rails::Rack::Debugger
    ...

Try running any generators(rails g controller zippo) and it will only show the usage, but not generate anything.

I'm pretty confident it's caused by http://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/railties/lib/rails/rack/d...
version.title: Rails::Rack::Debugger is killing _all_ rails generators

version.body: Rails::Rack::Debugger is added automatically by Rails when you specify --debugger as option to rails s. You are not supposed to add it to your own middleware stack. Be aware that it is not part of Rails public API.
version.body-html: Rails::Rack::Debugger is added automatically by Rails when you specify --debugger as option to rails s. You are not supposed to add it to your own middleware stack. Be aware that it is not part of Rails public API.
version.title: Rails::Rack::Debugger is killing _all_ rails generators
